thread.title: MEDIAWATCH - Macedonia s Migrant Crackdown
thread.title_full: MEDIAWATCH - Macedonia s Migrant Crackdown - France 24

author: Emma JAMES
title: MEDIAWATCH - Macedonia s Migrant Crackdown
text:
Media Watch takes a look at online reaction to the crackdown on migrants and refugees in Macedonia. A former British army officer is shaming the UK government over its failure to offer asylum to the Afghan interpreter who saved his life. And Banksy's new creation, a "bemusement park" called "Dismaland" charms anarchists, artists and fans of the anonymous graffiti artist. By Emma JAMES
Follow us
